longBusinessSummary: Test-Rite International Co., Ltd. imports and exports household products in Asia, America, Europe, Australia, and internationally. The company operates through Retail, Trading, and Construction segments. It offers shovels, sprinklers, etc.; Christmas gifts; outdoor tables and chairs, ice buckets, tents, etc.; barbecue stoves and other equipment; axes, saws, wrenches, and pliers; screws; automobile accessories and supplies, and repair and maintenance products; home storage box and cabinet, and do it yourself (DIY) furniture supplies; and travel storage products. The company also provides OA furniture and stationery; computer accessories; ceiling and electric fans; wall, table, and floor lamps; indoor and outdoor lighting products; blow-dryers, shavers, and infrared detectors; sports and leisure related products, including bicycles, and beauty and health merchandise; recreational products; and mattresses, sofas, sofa beds, and leisure chairs. In addition, it offers professional services for home improvement, home furnishing, furniture, bedding, interior design, and full-house decorations; and kitchen modification, plumbing and electrical maintenance, waterproofing and leak repair services, as well as air conditioning repair advisory services. Further, the company provides information software and electronic information; hardware and construction materials; interior design; mechanical and electronic engineering; cleaning and landscape design; logistics; other information; condominium management; and tally packaging and property leasing services, as well as builds dwellings and rents buildings. As of December 31, 2021, it operated 26 TLW (DIY) stores, 25 community stores, 26 HOLA stores, 3 Crate & Barrel stores, and 8 hoi! stores in Taiwan. The company was incorporated in 1978 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
